Package com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.model.business.penalty

Class ManagerPenalty

java.lang.Object
com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.model.business.penalty.ManagerPenalty
public class ManagerPenalty extends Object
This class is responsible for managing penalty-related operations. It interacts with the data access object (DAO) to perform various operations such as retrieving penalties, adding penalties, deleting penalties, performing payments, getting the last penalty for a client or vehicle...
